code.description: Status code indicating the result of the operation.

message.description: Additional information or message about the response.

data.description: Reward details for the given Core address.

pendingCoreReward.description: Pending CORE rewards for the Core address.

pendingHashReward.description: Pending HASH rewards for the Core address.

pendingBTCReward.description: Pending BTC rewards for the Core address.

claimedCoreReward.description: Collected CORE rewards for the Core address.

claimedHashReward.description: Collected HASH rewards for the Core address.

claimedBTCReward.description: Collected BTC rewards for the Core address.

400.description: Invalid Core address or an error occurred while retrieving reward details.

code.description: Error code indicating the result of the operation.
